txt.en: 'Among the creatures inhabiting the Slade of Shadows are the Druggavar. The presence of these fell spirits is a clear sign that the Old Woman of the Mountain is near at hand, for it was she who summoned them at first to Enedwaith.\n\n'As you investigate the Slade of Shadows, banish as many of the Druggavar as you are able... such fell creatures cannot be allowed to enter our world, for their combined power may prove the undoing of the Free Peoples.'
'Banish the foul druggavar back to the world of shadows, [placeholder]!'
The Slade of Shadows appears to be a focal point for the evil that is growing within the Gravenwood.
Defeated Druggavar at the Slade of Shadows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Druggavar at the Slade of Shadows ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Druggavar can be found within the Slade of Shadows, south of Andreg's position.\n\nAndreg has asked you to defeat the Druggavar summoned by the Old Woman of the Mountain.
